    • Method Detail

      • convertToDecimal

        public static long convertToDecimal(java.lang.String number,
                                    Base base)
        Converts the given number, to the decimal base.
        Warning: if any of the digits in the number are not recognized, it will throw a SymbolNotFoundException.
        Parameters:
        number - The number of the Base received by the Constructor
        base - the base to convert to decimal
        Returns:
        the number already converted to the decimal base

      • convertToCustomBase

        public static java.lang.String convertToCustomBase(long number,
                                                   Base base)
        Convert a given number to this base.
        Parameters:
        number - the number to be converted
        base - the base to which the number will be converted
        Returns:
        the given decimal number converted to the informed base

      • ConvertToCustomBase

        public static java.lang.String ConvertToCustomBase(java.lang.String number,
                                                   Base sourceBase,
                                                   Base targetBase)
        Converts the given numberin the form of String (can be any base), for the base given in the base parameter.
        Warning: if any of the digits in the number are not recognized, it will throw a SymbolNotFoundException.
        Parameters:
        number - The number of the Base received by the Constructor
        sourceBase - the base of origin of the number informed
        targetBase - the base conversion target
        Returns:
        the number already converted to the decimal base
